Introduction
This topic contains information on the evidence of disability for Veterans Pension purposes, including
when a rating determination of permanent and total (P&T) disability
is not required
, and
is required
, and
inclusion of service connected (SC) disabilities in a pension rating
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A - Requirements for Veterans Pension Ratings
citation: Part IX, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A
